title: Exclusive: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman's interview after budget 2022 - Economic Times
content: Exclusive: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman's interview after budget 2022  Economic Times
description: Stability in policymaking is in the interest of the economic growth of India, said Union Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman. In an exclusive interaction with ET NOW’s Nikunj Dalmia, Sitharaman spoke on the Union Budget, infrastructure, divestment policies, crypto policies, and much more. The government’s focus on building infrastructure to last for 100 years, she said. Commenting on the markets, Sitharaman said that the markets should not be worried about inflation & higher borrowings. She also shared views on the tax on Cryptocurrencies saying if someone is earning profits out of cryptos, they need to pay tax. Watch
